name: Slurp (cademille)
description:
A little game made in solo in 48h for My First Game Jam in July 2022.
 The theme was "Heal", that's why in this game you have to lick sad people to bring them joy.
What will be your time record ? How to play ?

Controls :  Arrow
Lick : Space Bar

Thanks to:

Tatie Dee for the cool funky disco song.
Parabellum Games for this free asset character.
NYKNCK for this free City Pack asset.
